Interface ThemeGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

                     float allowedUnusedFraction)

      • getOrder

        int getOrder()
        Themes with lower "order" values get their shot at generating content first.
        Returns:

      • getWeight

        float getWeight()
        What fraction of the Sector this theme wants to be used for, relative to other themes. The fraction it gets is weight / (total weight of all themes). Base value is 100.
        Returns:
